Configure syslog-ng

  1. Turn off SELinux
  2. Configure EPEL repo
    export http_proxy=http://170.64.216.197:8080
wget --proxy-user=x1kxk630 --proxy-password=<password> http://fedora.mirrors.pair.com/epel/6/i386/epel-release-6-7.noarch.rpm
rpm -i epel-release-6-7.noarch.rpm
  3. Making yum work with a proxy server
    export http_proxy=x1kxk630:<password>@170.64.216.197:8080
export https_proxy=x1kxk630:xntpd00#@170.64.216.197:8080
  4. Install syslog-ng
    yum install --enablerepo=epel syslog-ng
